bug.author: CedricProfessionnel
bug.summary: Class duplicate should not be possible - Image classification
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74309042/104230694-e5221b80-541b-11eb-9e6f-8b5ff403d8a4.png></denchmark-link>
Steps to Reproduce? Go to setting of image classification and create two class(label) with the same name <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74309042/104230930-34684c00-541c-11eb-93a4-f11a14940c47.png></denchmark-link>
